official-title.#text:
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that
		  matching contributions to the Thrift Savings Fund for Members of Congress be
		  made contingent on Congress completing action on a concurrent resolution on the
		  budget, for the fiscal year involved, which reduces the deficit, and for other
		  purposes.
